articles.title: DPRK Will Deal Merciless Retaliatory Strike at Provokers: Foreign Ministry Spokesman
articles.content:
DPRK Will Deal Merciless Retaliatory Strike at Provokers: Foreign Ministry Spokesman
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry released a statement on Saturday in denunciation of the ongoing U.S.-south Korea joint military drills against the DPRK.
					 The spokesman branded the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises being staged by the U.S. in south Korea as the most undisguised nuclear war move to throw the Korean Peninsula and the rest of Northeast Asia into nuclear disaster.
					
					 Nobody can vouch when the war drills kicked off after introducing a lot of nuclear strike means and huge forces into south Korea and the waters off it may go over to an actual war and, consequently, the situation on the Korean Peninsula is again inching close to the brink of a nuclear war, the statement said, adding:
					
					 The U.S. nuclear war drills assume more dangerous nature as they are staged at a time when it is resorting to the worst political and economic sanctions and pressure against the DPRK while finding fault with the latter's measure for bolstering up its nuclear force.
					
					 The U.S. seeks to convince the public that the joint military exercises are ascribable to the DPRK's access to nuclear weapons, but this is sophism making profound confusing of right and wrong.
					
					 The DPRK will never remain a passive onlooker to the new U.S. administration overtly revealing its intention to put military pressure on the DPRK and invade it while crying out for "peace by dint of strength".
					
					 The spokesman stressed that the army and people of the DPRK are unshakable in their will to further bolster up the deterrence for self-defence with the strategic nuclear force as a pivot in order to put a radical end to the danger of a nuclear war being imposed by the U.S. and deal a merciless retaliatory strike at any provocation by the invaders.

articles.title: DPRK Foreign Ministry Delegation Back Home
articles.content:
DPRK Foreign Ministry Delegation Back Home
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK led by Vice-Minister Ri Kil Song came back home Saturday after visiting China.

articles.title: DPRK Delegate Calls on NAM to Pay Attention to Situation on Korean Peninsula
articles.content:
DPRK Delegate Calls on NAM to Pay Attention to Situation on Korean Peninsula
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- A DPRK delegate made an address at the ambassador-level conference of the Coordinating Committee of the NAM held in the UN headquarters on Feb. 28.
					 The delegate drew attention to the fact that a serious situation is prevailing on the Korean peninsula due to the U.S.-south Korea joint military drills contrary to the noble idea of the non-aligned movement and referred to their aggressive nature and the validity of the DPRK's measures to bolster up its nuclear force.
					
					 From the viewpoint of ensuring peace and security on the Korean peninsula and in the Asia-Pacific region, military actions for aggression on the DPRK are persisting in the region and, consequently, a grave situation has been created to adversely affect global peace and security, he noted, and went on:
					
					 The large-scale joint military drills staged by the U.S. against the DPRK every year have recorded an infamous history of more than six decades and reached such a dangerous phase that they may lead to a nuclear war any moment. 
					
					 As all facts show, the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces' joint military drills are extremely aggressive and adventurous nuclear war drills aimed to bring down the DPRK from A to Z. Therefore, they pose a serious threat to peace and security on the Korean peninsula and the rest of the world.
					
					 The delegate expressed hope that the NAM whose basic mission is to oppose war and preserve peace would pay due attention to the serious situation on the peninsula and voice full support and solidarity to the DPRK's sincere efforts to defuse the danger of a nuclear war and ensure peace and security on the peninsula and the rest of the world.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye Group Should be Severely Punished
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye Group Should be Severely Punished
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- A spokesman of the Consultative Council for National Reconciliation Friday gave the following answer to a question raised by KCNA as regards the actions for the ouster of Park Geun Hye mounting among organizations of various circles in south Korea:
					 The waves of dynamic all-people resistance demanding the impeachment of Park are now sweeping south Korea with the date for deciding the impeachment of Park at the "constitutional court" approaching.
					
					 On March 1, the action organizations of various circles such as the People's Emergency Action for the Resignation of Park Geun Hye Regime held rallies "Day of the 18th all-people action for resignation of Park Geun Hye to mark March First" and staged demonstrations throughout south Korea including Seoul, Inchon, Kwangju, Taejon, Pusan, Ulsan and Taegu. They waged vigorous candlelight actions, shouting such slogans as "Impeach Park Geun Hye immediately" and "Her accomplice Hwang Kyo An should resign."
					
					 They set March as "all-out action period of candlelight rallies" for impeaching Park and steadily stage candlelight actions in various places in demand of earlier decision on impeachment not only on weekend but also on workdays, stirring up the atmosphere of impeachment.
					
					 The resolution to stage actions was manifested by the farmers' organizations including the south Korean Federation of Peasants Associations.
					
					 It is quite natural that people of all social strata in south Korea have turned their backs on the Park group of gangsters, disillusioned with its anti-social, anti-national deeds and corrupt politics.
					
					 March when the impeachment of Park Geun Hye is to be decided is an important point of time for the south Korean people as it is decisive of the victory of their just mass struggle.
					
					 The spokesman said that just a few days are left for traitor Park Geun Hye before meeting her miserable end as she committed all sorts of crimes by abusing her power in quest of wealth and luxury, utterly indifferent to the people's living, while maltreating the people as dogs and pigs.

articles.title: CPRC Memorandum Recollects Kim Jong Un's Exploits for Korea's Reunification
articles.content:
CPRC Memorandum Recollects Kim Jong Un's Exploits for Korea's Reunification 
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- The Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of the Country of the DPRK released a memorandum for conveying the exploits of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un for the country's reunification on Saturday to mark the fifth anniversary of his field inspection to Panmunjom, symbol of division of the nation.
					 Kim Jong Un set forth outstanding ideas, theories and policies, thus clearly indicating the way for the era of independent reunification, the memorandum said, and went on:
					
					 Thanks to the guidelines for independent reunification provided by him, the Korean nation could dynamically advance the patriotic cause for reunification full of hope and confidence, despite manifold difficulties and hardships, true to the behests of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Kim Jong Un has energetically led the struggle to foil the vicious challenge and obstructions of the separatist forces at home and abroad and open up a new turning phase for the country's reunification.
					
					 Thanks to his patriotic noble intention and will, drastic and realistic proposals and ways were provided for mending the deadlocked north-south relations and achieving national reconciliation and unity, and positive measures were taken for putting them into practice.
					
					 Had the south Korean authorities responded to the DPRK's sincere efforts and proposals, the north-south relations would not have faced such a worst phase in which a war may break out any moment and a fresh turn would have been effected in the efforts to accomplish the cause of independent reunification.
					
					 The memorandum praised Kim Jong Un for having provided wise guidance so as to rally all Koreans under the banner of reunification and patriotism with noble humanity, warm patriotism and love for the nation and to usher in the heyday of the nationwide movement for reunification for the past five years.
					
					 It is his noble intention for the great national unity that it is necessary to get united and join hands on the road for reunification with anyone who has conscience as a member of the Korean nation and is desirous of national reunification, the memorandum stressed, adding:
					
					 Kim Jong Un has firmly preserved the peace of the country and security of the nation with the treasured sword of Songun.
					
					 Had he not built up the arsenal of the Songun revolution, the disaster of a nuclear war would have been inflicted on this land more than hundreds of times and the existence of the nation would have been unthinkable.
					
					 Immensely high is the Korean nation's pride of holding him in high esteem as the great leader of the nation and the lodestar of national reunification.
					
					 The day of great auspicious event of the nation will surely come when all Koreans hug each other and shout hurrah at the top of their voices as there is Kim Jong Un who is wisely leading the cause of national reunification while meeting the blatant challenge of the anti-reunification forces at home and abroad with his strong pluck and courage of Mt Paektu.

articles.title: Fijian President Hails DPRK Government's Stand
articles.content:
Fijian President Hails DPRK Government's Stand
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- An Kwang Il, DPRK ambassador to Fiji, presented his credentials to Gioji Konusi Konrote, president of Fiji, on February 23.
					 The Fijian president welcomed the DPRK government's stand for developing the friendly relations between the two countries, hoping that the DPRK government and people would achieve bigger successes in the work for prosperity and development of the country.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Birthday Spreads to Persons of Merits
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Birthday Spreads to Persons of Merits
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un sent birthday spreads to Pak Jong Sik, a war veteran living in Kwanhun-dong, Kaesong City on the 90th birthday, and Prof. and Dr. Kim Ju Jin, a researcher and doctor of merit at the Clinical Medicine Institute of the South Hwanghae Provincial People's Hospital on the 80th birthday.
					 Pak Jong Sik, who was born as son of boatman in River Rakdong in North Kyongsang Province and experienced the sorrow of statelessness before Korea's liberation, joined the People's Army with the will to devotedly defend the country liberated by President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 He was awarded the title of DPRK Hero during the Fatherland Liberation War and worked hard as an official in the field of education and people's power organ after the war. After becoming a pensioner, he made an active contribution to the work for encouraging youngsters to live and work in the fighting spirit displayed in the 1950s
					
					 President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Un made sure that he had the honor to attend the national meeting of heroes, the 4th National Conference of War Veterans and other meetings.
					
					 Kim Ju Jin, who was born into a poor peasant family in Riwon County, South Hamgyong Province, devoted himself to the medical science researches and treatment and preventive work with the single desire to live up to the loving care of the great leaders who liberated the country and opened up the road of worthwhile life.
					
					 Working at the hospital for more than five decades, he achieved valuable successes in medical science researches and wrote books and successfully conducted a lot of operations, making a positive contribution to glorifying the socialist healthcare system.

articles.title: Breed-fish Ground Built in Orang County of DPRK
articles.content:
Breed-fish Ground Built in Orang County of DPRK
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- A modern breed-fish ground recently took its shape on the shore of Lake Mugye in Orang County, North Hamgyong Province of the DPRK.
					 It has indoor and outdoor fish ponds, hatchery, fodder-processing room and other necessary facilities for breeding different species of freshwater fishes like silver carp and carp in all seasons. It is also equipped with a comprehensive fish-farming management system and an automatic temperature control system.
					
					 And a pavilion and resting place were built near the ground, adding beauty to Lake Mugye.

articles.title: First Democratic Reform in DPRK
articles.content:
First Democratic Reform in DPRK
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- It has been 71 years since the Agrarian Reform Law was promulgated in Korea.
					 The agrarian reform was the first democratic reform which the people's government accomplished in a short span of time under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung after the country's liberation from Japan's colonial rule.
					
					 Under the slogan "Land to the Tillers!" the President set forth it as the basic principle of the agrarian reform to liquidate the feudal relations of landownership and set up peasants as the owners of land.
					
					 He also indicated strategic and tactical tasks to enforce the agrarian reform on the principle of confiscation without compensation and free distribution and achieve the victory in its enforcement through an acute class struggle.
					
					 On the basis of detailed study and analysis of the situation in rural areas, he decided on the policies on agrarian reform, including the principle of landownership and method of enforcing the reform, before promulgating the "Law on Agrarian Reform in North Korea" on March 5, Juche 35 (1946).
					
					 The promulgation of the law was a great event of historic significance which put forward peasants as the permanent owners of land and rooted out the feudal relations of landownership, a source of exploitation and oppression.
					
					 Thanks to the successful agrarian reform, more than a million hectares of land were confiscated without compensation and distributed free to over 720,000 peasant families.

articles.title: Nothing Can Quench Candlelight of S. Koreans: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
Nothing Can Quench Candlelight of S. Koreans: KCNA Commentary
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- A rally to counter the people's candlelight rally was held in south Korea, stunning the world people.
					 Whenever south Koreans from all walks of life hold candlelight rallies, the old fanatics of such ultra-right group of conservatives as the "General Federation for Freedom" and "Oboi Association" and philistines keen on earning a few pennies hold a rally to counter them.
					
					 The ruthless gangsters brand the people's candlelight rallies as "riot of the Reds" and even encourage Park Geun Hye more dead than alive to cheer herself up.
					
					 They trumpet about "retraction of impeachment motion", "stop to special investigation" and "declaration of martial law," holding high even the "Stars and Stripes."
					
					 The counter-rally of the group of ultra-right conservatives challenging the people's candlelight rally is the last-ditch efforts to check impeachment of Park Geun Hye and revive the traitorous regime that is thrown into the abyss of ruin.
					
					 The waves of candlelight actions sweeping south Korea are an eruption of the bitter wrath of the people against the group of traitors going against the demand of the people and the nation.
					
					 The candlelight rallies are attended by broad segments of people who curse and hate Park Geun Hye irrespective of affiliation, i.e. whether they belong to progressive or conservative, and region and class.
					
					 The participants in the candlelight rallies that have been waged nonstop since its start toward the end of last October number more than 14 million in total.
					
					 The sea of candlelight surrounds Chongwadae, a citadel of the reactionary rule, and shouts calling for impeachment of Park and resignation of the traitorous regime are heard nonstop.
					
					 The candlelight that do not go out despite biting cold and blizzard flares up more furiously with the approach of the trial for impeaching Park.
					
					 It is foolish and reckless for the group of conservatives to hold a rally to quench the candlelight.
					
					 Those who take part in the counter rally are philistines keen on getting a few pennies from ultra-right conservatives and old hooligans serving Park.
					
					 The ultra-rightist conservative group, backed by Chongwadae and Park's stooges, pays 20 000 to 60 000 won to those who take part in the counter rally and 150 000 won to women with baby carriages.
					
					 The conservative riff-raffs are running wild without reason just like hungry dogs driven to hunting as they have neither ability nor independent view to discern the right from the wrong.
					
					 Media at home and abroad jeer this as "last-ditch wriggling to check impeachment of Park Geun Hye", "hysteria of pseudo-religionists worshipping Park", "desperate efforts of those more dead than alive who view the world with distorted standpoint". Foreigners who witnessed it also derided the counter rally as "crazy act hardly understandable".
					
					 The frenzy of the ultra-right conservative group is the last-ditch efforts of those in fear of their imminent destruction.
					
					 The people's mindset also passed stern judgment of impeachment to Park who committed indelible crimes before the nation.
					
					 Nothing can quench the candlelight and save the ship from getting wrecked in the face of the enraged public.
					
					 The reckless ruckus of the ultra-right conservatives will only precipitate the destruction of traitor Park.

articles.title: No One Can Pull up DPRK's Exercise of Right to Self-defence: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
No One Can Pull up DPRK's Exercise of Right to Self-defence: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- Under the manipulation of the U.S. the UNSC issued a press statement recently faulting the DPRK's test fire of ground-to-ground medium to long-range strategic ballistic rocket Pukguksong-2 and calling for "additional crucial measure" over "its breach of resolution".
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday in a commentary terms this U.S.-style brigandish logic that others are not allowed to do things which it can do.
					
					 The test-fire of the above-said rocket is the DPRK's exercise of right to self-defence which no one can fault, the commentary says, adding:
					
					 It is well known to the world that the U.S. and its vassal forces' nuclear threat and blackmail and war drills for aggression, which have persisted for the last several decades, are the main factor of compelling the DPRK to have access to nuclear deterrent.
					
					 The UN has the mission to preserve world peace and security and regards it as the principle of its activities to respect the sovereignty of the countries and not interfere in their territories. Therefore, what it should take issue with is not the DPRK's exercise of right to self-defence but the U.S. and its vassal forces' nuclear war drills against the former.
					
					 The UNSC has neither justification nor face to pull up the DPRK over its exercise of the right to self-defence as the former has completely lost the principle of impartiality.
					
					 The UNSC should realize the DPRK's strategic position and the fundamentally changed strategic structure, its result.
					
					 Despite any mud-slinging, the nuclear force for self-defense of the DPRK, a nuclear power and strategic rocket power in the East, is serving as tremendous deterrent preventing the disaster of a nuclear war on the Korean peninsula and the region.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Decisively Meeting Warmongers' Aggressive Challenges
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Decisively Meeting Warmongers' Aggressive Challenges 
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet forces together with the U.S. kicked off the large-scale joint military drills against the DPRK in all parts of south Korea on March 1.
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday in a commentary says the joint military drills are a serious provocation wantonly disturbing peace and stability on the Korean peninsula and pushing the situation to the point of explosion as they reveal their scenario for a nuclear war against the DPRK.
					
					 The warmongers are running the whole gamut of rhetoric to justify their saber-rattling at any cost, but they only remind one of a thief crying "Stop the thief!" and are nothing but shameless falsification of reality.
					
					 It is none other than the U.S. and the south Korean warmongers that are escalating the tension and increasing the danger of a nuclear war on the peninsula.
					
					 Owing to this reckless muscle-flexing of the warmongers in collusion with outside forces, the situation on the peninsula is pushed to the brink of a war. 
					
					 As long as the U.S. and the puppet warmongers persist in the anti-DPRK nuclear war rehearsals, the DPRK will further bolster up its nuclear deterrent for self-defense to preserve its sovereignty and security and resolutely meet their challenges for aggression.
					
					 The DPRK shows no mercy to the aggressors who dare hurt its dignity and sovereignty even a bit. 
					
					 Should the enemies dare launch a preemptive attack on the DPRK, obsessed with a daydream, it will make a prompt merciless counteraction against them, warns the commentary.

articles.title: Stop to Joint Military Drills Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Stop to Joint Military Drills Demanded in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- According to the south Korean online newspaper Tongil News, 38 civic and social organizations of south Korea including the People for Achieving Peace and Reunification and the Solidarity for Progress held a press conference in Seoul on March 1 in protest against the U.S. and south Korean warmongers' war exercises for aggression.
					 At the conference speakers expressed concern, saying that the deployment of nuclear strategic assets and typical preemptive strike weapons is expected in view of news that two nuclear carriers are to be rarely involved in the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military drills.
					
					 They claimed that the joint military exercises increase the danger of a nuclear war and escalate mistrust and confrontation on the Korean Peninsula and thus make the settlement of a nuclear issue and achievement of peace difficult.
					
					 They charged that the growing military tension due to the joint military exercises only offers an opportunity and pretext to the U.S. and Japan to build a missile shield and alliance in Northeast Asia.
					
					 They urged an immediate stop to the illegal joint military drills, saying that frequent saber-rattling of south Korea and the U.S. against the DPRK would only invite the latter's strong counter-action.

articles.title: Solicitation Diplomacy of S. Korean Diplomatic Chief Flailed
articles.content:
Solicitation Diplomacy of S. Korean Diplomatic Chief Flailed
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- Puppet Foreign Minister of south Korea Yun Pyong Se is getting evermore crazy in his solicitation diplomacy.
					 Last year he staged what he called "shuttle diplomacy" in a bid to generate cooperation in the campaign for stifling his fellow countrymen in the north only to be scorned by the world people. In February he again begged for "cooperation for stifling the north over its nuclear weapons" during his overseas trip.
					
					 The first slogan he shouted when holding the post of diplomatic chief with the backing of traitor Park some years ago was "Let's keep pressure on the north through international cooperation". This reminds us of the fact that begging outsiders for help is Yun's inborn disposition.
					
					 Yun cannot do otherwise as such diplomacy is the only thing he learned in south Korea, a colony of the U.S., while going in cahoots with sycophants and traitors opposed to reunification.
					
					 Irony is that the above-said solicitation diplomacy only invites derision and denunciation of the international community as it brings to light the despicable colors of confrontational maniacs and psychopaths.
					
					 The DPRK has become the beacon of hope and an envy of the world progressives thanks to its transparent idea of independence against imperialism and tremendous national power.
					
					 No country will have right view of the stupid who sling such mud at their fellow countrymen in the north who speak for independence and justice as "time bomb" and "outright challenge to international order." 
					
					 The U.S. and Japan and other masters are now in a position to get help from others to get rid of the striking range, in fear of the daily increasing military might of the DPRK. How detestable and troublesome it will be for them to see meager stooges who go about begging.
					
					 It is said from the olden times that beggary is done alone. Yun loudly begged for help only during foreign trip, in disregard of the mental sufferings of his masters. It is quite natural for him to get pressure, only getting cold shoulder.
					
					 No one is lending an ear to the rubbish talked by the servants who maintain their existence only in reliance on outsiders and the conservatives keen to stifle the fellow countrymen.
					
					 Sweeping south Korea at present are candlelight rallies of people from all walks of life to throw overboard the group of traitors like Park Geun Hye and Yun Pyong Se.
					
					 Their solicitation for cooperation in pressurizing the fellow countrymen would only invite bitterer disgrace, humiliation and miserable end.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Carried by Angolan Paper
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Carried by Angolan Paper
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- The Angolan newspaper O Pais on February 14 carried the detailed gist of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Step Up the Building of a Thriving Country by Applying Kim Jong Il's Patriotism" to mark the Day of the Shining Star.
					 The work, published on July 26, Juche 101 (2012), deals with the essence of Kim Jong Il's patriotism and the noble life of leader Kim Jong Il dedicated to the country and the people.
					
					 It also clarifies the important matters in applying Kim Jong Il's patriotism.
					
					 The newspaper illustrated a portrait of smiling Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Lauded by Foreign Newspapers
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Lauded by Foreign Newspapers
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- Foreign newspapers gave special write-ups, illustrated with portraits of smiling leader Kim Jong Il and his photos, to his 75th birth anniversary.
					 The February issue of the Bulgarian newspaper Iskra noted that Kim Jong Il pursued his unique Songun politics and thus firmly defended socialism in the DPRK and made a turning-point in the national reunification.
					
					 The February issue of the Belarusian newspaper Bperyod said that he devoted all his life to the people's happiness and the country's prosperous development.
					
					 The Feb. 14th issue of the Thai Xing San Daily praised his matchless political and leadership abilities that were more strikingly displayed at the end of the 20th century when the Cold War was epitomized to the DPRK-U.S. confrontation.
					
					 The Feb. 11th issue of the Tanzanian newspaper Uhuru said that his birth was an event of great significance in the destiny and development of not only the Korean people but also the world progressives.
					
					 The Feb. 10th issue of a Senegalese newspaper noted that he formulated the revolutionary idea of President Kim Il Sung as the integral system of ideology, theory and method of Juche through his energetic ideo-theoretical activities to clearly show the road ahead of the progressive mankind.
					
					 The Feb. 13th issue of the Mozambican newspaper Noticias stressed that he defended the destiny of the country and the nation from the imperialists' anti-DPRK moves, intensified with the collapse of socialism in some countries as an opportunity, and pushed ahead with the building of a socialist power by dint of single-minded unity.
					
					 The Feb. 8th issue of the Guinean newspaper Horoya, the Feb. 14th issue of the Egyptian newspaper Al Ahrar and the Feb. 13th issue of the Zambian newspaper Zambia Daily Mail praised the exploits of Kim Jong Il who dedicated all his life to the prosperity of the country and its people's happiness and to the global cause of independence.

articles.title: Korean Book, Photo, Stamp and Handicraft Exhibitions Held Abroad
articles.content:
Korean Book, Photo, Stamp and Handicraft Exhibitions Held Abroad
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- Korean book, photo, stamp and handicraft exhibitions took place in Khabarovsk of Russia, Shanghai and Dandong of China, Jakarta of Indonesia, Velingrad of Bulgaria, Belgrade of Serbia and Callao of Peru to mark the 75th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 On display at their venues were photos showing the exploits of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and the revolutionary activities of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Attending the opening-ceremonies of exhibitions were personages of political and public circles and popular masses of those countries and staff members of DPRK missions.
					
					 The vice-chairman of the Khabarovsk City Legislative Assembly expressed the will to more briskly hold cultural events overflowing with the Russia-DPRK friendship, praising Kim Jong Il as a great statesman who is always alive in the hearts of Khabarovsk citizens.
					
					 The deputy mayor of Dandong and other personages of China said that Kim Jong Il is a great thinker-theoretician and a prominent statesman who devoted his all to the revolutionary cause of Juche and the cause of national reunification and made great contributions to the development of the Sino-DPRK friendly relations. They added that the Chinese people are remembering him with boundless reverence for the peerlessly great man.
					
					 The general secretary of the Peruvian Port Trade Union who is an executive member of the General Federation of Workers said that the exhibition would serve as an important occasion for further deepening the understanding and friendship between the peoples of the two countries and realizing the cultural exchange and introducing the excellent culture of the Korean nation to the Peruvian people.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star Marked in Benin, Germany
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star Marked in Benin, Germany
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- Events took place in Cotonou of Benin and Berlin, Koeln and Bautzen of Germany between February 3 and 14 to mark the Day of the Shining Star, the birthday of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Ali Houdou, president of the Socialist Party of Benin, said that Kim Jong Il developed in depth the Juche idea, the Songun idea founded by President Kim Il Sung to make it serve as an immortal banner of the Korean revolution and turned the DPRK into a powerful country.
					
					 Hessou Kohovi, chairman of the Benin National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, said that Kim Jong Il, who led the cause of global independence, made the DPRK firmly stand in the struggle against imperialism to give strength and courage to the countries and nations aspiring after independence.
					
					 Pascal Zouncheme, chief of the Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and rector of the Cotonou Institute of Journalism of Benin, said that Kim Jong Il always found himself among the people, having a short and uncomfortable sleep and a rice ball as his meal, adding that his life of devotion will be always cherished in the mind of the progressive mankind.
					
					 The chairman of the Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany said that the Korean people and the world's progressives are still and deeply yearning for Kim Jong Il who made titanic feats for Korea's reunification and happiness of the people and for the cause of global independence.
					
					 Manfred Schneider, chief of the German Group for the Study of Korean Culture, the organizational secretary of the German Branch of the Korean Friendship Association, Thomas Lichter, vice-chairman of the Federal Republic of Germany-DPRK Association, and other speakers praised the energetic ideo-theoretical activities of Kim Jong Il and his Songun revolutionary feats and career.
					
					 Congratulatory messages to respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un were adopted at the events held in Koeln and Bautzen of Germany.

articles.title: MINREX expone la posicion de la RPDC de dar el ataque de venganza a provocadores
articles.content:
MINREX expone la posicion de la RPDC de dar el ataque de venganza a provocadores
Pyongyang, 4 de marzo (ACNC) -- Con respecto a que los Estados Unidos libran junto con los titeres surcoreanos los ejercicios militares conjuntos de caracter agresivo contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, el portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la RPDC publico el dia 4 una declaracion.
					Los simulacros conjuntos Foal Eagle y Key Resolve devienen mas abiertos ensayos de guerra nuclear para acarrear los desastres nucleares a la Peninsula Coreana y el resto del Nordeste Asiatico, dijo el portavoz y continuo:
					
					Nadie sabe cuando pasara a la guerra real el alboroto belico que se desarrolla en el suelo surcoreano y la zona maritima periferica con la movilizacion de muchos medios de ataque nuclear y enormes efectivos, debido a lo cual la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana llega otra vez al borde de la guerra nuclear. 
					
					Lo mas grave del caso es que los ejercicios de guerra nuclear de EE.UU. se coinciden con la intensificacion de su campana de sancion y presion politicas y economicas mas crueles que nunca contra el fortalecimiento de las fuerzas armadas nucleares de la RPDC. 
					
					EE.UU. engana la opinion publica como si sus intensos simulacros conjuntos se debieran a la posesion de armas nucleares de la RPDC, pero es una sofisteria para convertir lo negro en lo blanco.
					
					La RPDC no estara con los brazos cruzados ante el hecho de que la nueva administracion estadounidense expone en publico su intento de presion militar y agresion contra la RPDC abogando por la "paz asegurada por la fuerza". 
					
					El ejercito y pueblo coreanos tienen la firme voluntad de consolidar mas el disuasivo de autodefensa centrado en las fuerzas armadas nucleares estrategicas para eliminar de raiz el peligro de guerra nuclear proveniente de EE.UU. y aniquilar despiadadamente con el fuerte ataque de venganza a los invasores que atenten aun en lo minimo contra la patria.

articles.title: Portavoz de MINREX rechaza intento de incluir de nuevo a la RPDC en lista de patrocinadores del terrorismo
articles.content:
Portavoz de MINREX rechaza intento de incluir de nuevo a la RPDC en lista de patrocinadores del terrorismo
Pyongyang, 4 de marzo (ACNC) -- En exclusiva con la ACNC concedida el dia 3 con motivo de que se escucha nuevamente en EE.UU. la absurda demanda de volver a definir a la RPDC como "pais patrocinador del terrorismo", el portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la RPDC dio la siguiente respuesta:
					Desde el principio de este ano, algunos congresistas y otras fuerzas conservadoras intransigentes de EE.UU. plantean el problema de redefinir a nuestro pais como "patrocinador del terrorismo".
					
					El gobierno de la RPDC expreso claramente a la sociedad internacional su posicion de principios de negar todas formas de actos terroristas y cualquier apoyo a los mismos y la demuestra constantemente con acciones.
					
					Poner a pesar de ese hecho tal estigma a nuestro pais que no tiene nada que ver con el terrorismo es una expresion de veto habitual y actitud hostil.
					
					Nuestro pais no sera el "patrocinador del terrorismo" aunque EE.UU. vuelva a ponernos ese calificativo segun su pauta e intereses.
					
					Ya paso la epoca en que EE.UU. oprimia a los paises desagradables calificandolos de ilegales e ilegitimos y manejando a su antojo el mundo entero.
					
					EE.UU. experimentara en carne propia cuan horrible sera el costo de su absurda acusacion a la digna RPDC.

articles.title: Hay que castigar duro a banda traidora de Park Geun-hye, apunta portavoz del CRN
articles.content:
Hay que castigar duro a banda traidora de Park Geun-hye, apunta portavoz del CRN
Pyongyang, 4 de marzo (ACNC) -- Con respecto a que toma auge la lucha de las entidades surcoreanas de distintos estratos por la dimision de Park Geun-hye, el portavoz del Consejo de Reconciliacion Nacional dio el dia 3 a la ACNC la siguiente respuesta:
					A medida que se acerca el dia de la sentencia de la "Corte Constitucional" sobre el caso de dimision de Park Geun-hye, se torna mas intensa que nunca en el Sur de Corea la lucha de toda la poblacion por la destitucion de ella.
					
					El dia primero, la Accion Emergente del Pueblo para la Retirada del "Poder" de Park Geun-hye y otras entidades de diferentes sectores realizaron en Seul, Inchon, Kwangju, Taejon, Pusan, Ulsan, Taegu y otras partes el mitin con velas por "El Primero de Marzo, Dia de la 18a Accion de Todo el Pueblo por la Retirada de Park Geun-hye" y la marcha gritando consignas "Dimitan de inmediato a Park Geun-hye", "Retirate, el complice Hwang Kyo An", etc.
					
					Definieron el mes en curso como "periodo de concentracion en el mitin con velas" para la deposicion de Park y continuan esta forma de lucha tanto en fines de semana como en los dias normales en demanda de la rapida decision sobre la dimision.
					
					Gritando lemas "La dimision de Park Geun-hye es la orden del pueblo" y "Entremos a Chongwadae para destituir a Park Geun-hye", la Federacion Nacional de las Asociaciones de Campesinos y otras entidades campesinas expanden a mas de 100 ciudades y distritos la marcha de maquinas agricolas, comenzada el 23 de febrero, expresando la decision de acudir en tractores a Seul como gesto de protesta si resulta rechazada la dimision de Park.
					
					Es natural que los surcoreanos hayan dado espaldas a la pandilla de Park desilusionados de su conducta antipopular y antinacional y politica corrupta.
					
					Marzo, tiempo de la toma de resolucion sobre el caso de dimision, es el instante muy importante que decidira si concluye con victoria o no la justa lucha masiva de la poblacion surcoreana continuada hasta ahora.
					
					Faltan pocos dias para que termine el sucio destino de la traidora que ha cometido todas las infamias abusando del poder mientras perseguia solo su vida opulenta y acomodada sin hacer caso de la vida del pueblo maltratando a este como animales.

articles.title: Delegado coreano llama al MNOAL a prestar atencion a la situacion de Peninsula Coreana
articles.content:
Delegado coreano llama al MNOAL a prestar atencion a la situacion de Peninsula Coreana 
Pyongyang, 4 de marzo (ACNC) -- El delegado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea pronuncio un discurso en la reunion a nivel de embajadores del Buro de Coordinacion del MNOAL, efectuada el 28 de febrero en la sede de la ONU.
					Desperto la atencion sobre el hecho de que debido a los ejercicios belicos conjuntos EE.UU.-Sur de Corea, se crea en la Peninsula Coreana una grave situacion que contraviene al noble ideal del MNOAL. Y revelo el caracter agresivo de los simulacros conjuntos y dio enfasis en la justeza de las medidas de la RPDC para el fortalecimiento de sus fuerzas armadas nucleares. 
					
					Desde el punto de vista de la preservacion de la paz y la seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana y el resto de la region de Asia-Pacifico, continuan las acciones militares agresivas contra la RPDC que afectan a la paz y seguridad del mundo, dijo y continuo:
					
					Los ejercicios belicos conjuntos de gran envergadura que desarrolla cada ano EE.UU. contra la RPDC tienen la historia de mala fama de mas de 60 anos y ahora llegan a la etapa aventurera como un detonador de guerra nuclear que pueda hacer explosion en cualquier momento.
					
					Como vemos, los ejercicios militares conjuntos EE.UU.-Sur de Corea, siendo ensayos de guerra nuclear de caracter agresivo y aventurero para derrocar el regimen de la RPDC, amenazan gravemente la paz y seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana y el mundo. 
					
					Por ultimo, el orador expreso la esperanza de que el MNOAL prestara atencion merecida a la grave situacion de la Peninsula Coreana de acuerdo con su mision principal de rechazar la guerra y defender la paz y manifestara el apoyo y solidaridad con los sinceros esfuerzos de la RPDC por prevenir el peligro de la guerra nuclear y preservar la paz y seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana y el resto del mundo.

articles.title: CRPP elogia en su memorando hazanas de Kim Jong Un por la reunificacion de patria
articles.content:
CRPP elogia en su memorando hazanas de Kim Jong Un por la reunificacion de patria
Pyongyang, 4 de marzo (ACNC) -- En ocasion del 5o aniversario de la inspeccion del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un a Phanmunjom, simbolo de la division nacional, el Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea publico el dia 4 un memorando para transmitir sus hazanas acumuladas en la causa de reunificacion de la patria.
					  El Maximo Dirigente ilumino claramente la via de la epoca de reunificacion independiente al presentar sus ideas y teorias y orientaciones extraordinarias, apunta el documento y prosigue:
					
					  Gracias a la guia directriz de reunificacion independiente preparada por el, la nacion coreana pudo impulsar con energia esa causa patriotica con la conviccion redoblada superando las multiples pruebas y dificultades en pleno acato a los legados de los grandes Lideres Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il.
					
					  El dirigio energicamente la lucha por abrir la nueva fase trascendental para la reintegracion territorial dando al traste con los brutales desafios y maniobras obstruccionistas de las fuerzas anti-reunificacion internas y externas.
					
					  Gracias a su noble proposito patriotico, se prepararon las propuestas y proyectos practicos y trascendentales para reparar las relaciones Norte-Sur caidas en la ruptura y lograr la reconciliacion y unidad de la nacion y se tomaron las medidas para ponerlos en practica.
					
					  Si las autoridades surcoreanas hubieran aceptado los sinceros esfuerzos y propuestas de la RPDC, las relaciones Norte-Sur no se habrian puesto en la peor coyuntura de ahora a punto de guerra sino se habria registrado un nuevo viraje en el cumplimiento de la causa de reunificacion independiente.
					
					  Durante 5 anos pasados, con sus nobles personalidades y calido amor por la patria y la nacion, Kim Jong Un agrupo a todos los coreanos bajo la bandera de reunificacion y patriotismo y les condujo sabiamente a abrir la era dorada del movimiento pannacional por la reunificacion.
					
					  Hay que unirse con todas las personas que aspiren a la reunificacion de la patria con la conciencia nacional y luchar juntos por cumplir la maxima causa nacional, he aqui el noble proposito de la gran unidad nacional del Maximo Dirigente.
					
					  El defendio firmemente la paz del pais y la seguridad de la nacion con el medio omnipotente del Songun.
					
					Si el no hubiera fortalecido el arsenal de la revolucion del Songun, esta tierra ya habria sufrido mil veces el desastre de guerra nuclear y seria imposible pensar en la existencia de la nacion.
					
					  Hoy en dia, el pueblo coreano y toda la nacion se sienten mas orgullosos que nunca por tener a Kim Jong Un como gran dirigente de la nacion y lucero de la reunificacion de la patria.
					
					  Gracias a el quien encarna el espiritu y coraje del monte Paektu, llegara sin falta el dia de gran jubilo en que todos los compatriotas daran vivas a la reunificacion.
